Are you sure you want to discard your draft? 
You will not be able to recover the changes.

findingDetails.respondToFindingDetails: When corrective actions have been executed, verify the effectiveness of action(s) and state the correction, root cause and corrective action. Your lead auditor will follow-up on the finding when submitted.
findingDetails.respondToFindingHint1: Describe the immediate action taken to fix the nonconformity, ensuring the issue is resolved promptly.
findingDetails.respondToFindingHint2: Identify the underlying reason or factor that led to the nonconformity, aiming to address the source of the problem.
findingDetails.respondToFindingHint3: Outline the systematic steps taken to prevent the recurrence of the root cause, focusing on long-term resolution and prevention.
findingDetails.respondToFindingQ1: What correction has been done to eliminate the nonconformity?
findingDetails.respondToFindingQ1Placeholder: Example: I’ve resolved the following issue by doing...
findingDetails.respondToFindingQ3: What corrective action has been taken to eliminate the root cause of the nonconformity?
findingDetails.respondToFindingQ3Placeholder: What did you do to resolve the issue?

responseHistory.previousResponsesDescription: An overview of all status changes, submitted responses and replies from your auditors. Some explanation or instructions about this panel on the side and how to interact with it.
